item.title: Having fun with GitHub Codespaces, docker, swagger codegen cli
item.description: In this video I'm going to show you... How you can use GitHub Codespaces to prototype an idea and put it into action... or should I say actions with nothing more than your browser.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Developing software for the modern world using only your browser and GitHub
item.description: In this video I'm going to show you... How to develop software for the modern world using only your browser and GitHub.

item.title: Allow project users to manage Permissions Groups in Azure DevOps
item.description: In this video I'm going to show you... How to allow project users to manage Permissions Groups in Azure DevOps that aren't project administrators
